scripts.start: python -c "import subprocess, sys, os; venv_python = 'venv\\\\Scripts\\\\python.exe' if os.name == 'nt' else 'venv/bin/python'; subprocess.run([venv_python, '-m', 'uvicorn', 'app:app', '--host', '0.0.0.0', '--port', '8000'])"
scripts.dev: python -c "import subprocess, sys, os; venv_python = 'venv\\\\Scripts\\\\python.exe' if os.name == 'nt' else 'venv/bin/python'; subprocess.run([venv_python, '-m', 'uvicorn', 'app:app', '--reload', '--host', '0.0.0.0', '--port', '8000'])"
scripts.install: python -c "import subprocess, sys, os; pip_cmd = 'venv\\\\Scripts\\\\pip.exe' if os.name == 'nt' else 'venv/bin/pip'; subprocess.run([pip_cmd, 'install', '-r', 'requirements.txt'])"
scripts.test: python -c "import subprocess, sys, os; venv_python = 'venv\\\\Scripts\\\\python.exe' if os.name == 'nt' else 'venv/bin/python'; subprocess.run([venv_python, '-m', 'pytest'])"
scripts.freeze: python -c "import subprocess, sys, os; pip_cmd = 'venv\\\\Scripts\\\\pip.exe' if os.name == 'nt' else 'venv/bin/pip'; subprocess.run([pip_cmd, 'freeze'])"
